```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
}
dat<- readxl::read_xls('GSSlab3data.xls')

```

Question 1)
```{r}
str(dat)

dat$married <- factor(dat$`Marital status`, levels= c('Never married', 'Married','Widowed','Divorced','No answer','Separated'))
dat$happy <- factor(dat$`General happiness`, levels = c('Very happy','Pretty happy','Not too happy','No answer','Not applicable','Don\'t know'))
dat$sex <- factor(dat$`Respondents sex`, levels = c('Female','Male'))
ggplot(data = dat, aes(x=happy, fill=married)) + geom_bar(position = 'Dodge') + facet_wrap(vars(sex))
```
